alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Central Marion; Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Clay; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns; Western Alachua; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 10:45PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Flagler, southeastern Bradford, southeastern Alachua, southern St. Johns, north central Marion, Putnam and southern Clay Counties through 1115 PM EDT... At 1045 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Melrose, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine, Palatka, Interlachen, Hastings, Melrose, East Palatka, Saint Augustine Beach, Hawthorne, Marineland and Vilano Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM EDT for northern and northeastern Florida.
